Articles.Content:
PLEASE, PLEASEEE Add an Autopilot attachment! This is how it should work: Go into map view, Click on a planet, Select the button "Set as Autopilot target", Launch, and the rocket auto-flies there! I'm suggesting this because, I've never gotten to even the Mun before!

If there's anything you'd like to say back, reply to this thread.

Hello there

Welcome to the Suggestion forums. Please refer to the stickied thread (particularly the What not to suggest? list). As you can see, a lot of these topics have been discussed from just about every angle. Further threads just add noise and inspire frustration in everyone involved. Autopilots in particular are a difficult and controversial topic here. There is a variety of mods that have this functionality, most prominently MechJeb (I believe this is the correct link right now).

As for your troubles getting to the moon, please do refer to our Gameplay Questions and Tutorials section. With that said, I'm closing this thread for the aforementioned reasons.

FEichinger
